recommendation: On 24 September 2020, the Commission recommended that KiwiRail undertake a review of the New Zealand Rail Operating Rules and Procedures to ensure that appropriate guidance is provided for those involved in the operation of work trains.
safety_issue: The New Zealand Rail Operating Rules and Procedures did not provide guidance on how to manage work trains within a worksite and did not differentiate between a train moving to a point where work needs to take place and a train carrying out its designated work as a work train.
